text: Safari Ravenna is a safari park and zoo in Ravenna, Emilia-Romagna, Italy, created in 2012 near the amusement park of Mirabilandia; extending over an area of 340.000 square metres.Il cambiamento == References == Category:2010s establishments in Italy Category:2012 establishments in Europe Category:Zoos in Italy Category:Ravenna
title: Safari Ravenna
